;;;;
;; Scenario from cookbook 20-Apr-2005
;;;;

(spec_version "V2_0")

(spec_agent
  (label Agent_Green)
)

(spec_agent
  (label Agent_Red)
)

(spec_agent
  (label Agent_Purple)
)

(spec_agent
  (label Agent_Yellow)
)

(spec_agent
  (label)
)

; This agent group is made up to represent all four agents or a group of agents
(spec_agent
  (label Agent_Group)
)

(spec_task_group
   (label Problem1)
   (subtasks Window1 Window2 Window3 Window4)
   (qaf q_min)
)

(spec_task_group
   (label Problem2)
   (subtasks Window1 Window2 Window3 Window_wrong)
   (qaf q_min)
)

(spec_task_group
   (label)
   (subtasks Window1 Window2 Window3 Window4)
   (qaf q_min)
)

(spec_task
   (label Window1)
   (earliest_start_time 0)
   (deadline 26)
   (subtasks CTask1)
   (qaf q_sum)
)

(spec_task
   (label)
   (earliest_start_time 0)
   (deadline 26)
   (subtasks CTask1)
   (qaf q_sum)
)

(spec_task
   (label Window5)
   (earliest_start_time 0)
   (deadline 26)
   (subtasks CTask1_wrong)
   (qaf q_sum)
)

(spec_task
   (label CTask1)
   (subtasks Method1A Method1B Method1C Method1D Method1E Method1F)
   (qaf q_max)
)

(spec_method
   (label Method1A)
   (agent Agent_Red)
   (outcomes
      (Method1A_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 20.0 0.5 27.0 0.25 13.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 20 0.5 26 0.25 14 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

(spec_method
   (label Method1B)
   (agent Agent_Red)
   (outcomes
      (Method1B_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 16.0 0.5 19.0 0.25 13.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 16 0.5 14 0.25 18 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)


(spec_method
   (label Method1C)
   (agent Agent_Red)
   (outcomes
      (Method1C_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 12.0 1.0)
         (duration_distribution 12 0.5 13 0.25 11 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

(spec_method
   (label Method1D)
   (agent Agent_Green)
   (outcomes
      (Method1D_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 16.0 0.5 20.0 0.25 12.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 16 0.5 20 0.25 12 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

(spec_method
   (label Method1E)
   (agent Agent_Yellow)
   (outcomes
      (Method1E_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 12.0 0.5 13.0 0.25 11.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 12 0.5 13 0.25 11 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

(spec_method
   (label Method1F)
   (agent Agent_Purple)
   (outcomes
      (Method1F_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 8.0 1.0)
         (duration_distribution 8 1.0)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)


(spec_task
   (label Window2)
   (earliest_start_time 18)
   (deadline 44)
   (subtasks CTask2a CTask2b)
   (qaf q_sum)
)

(spec_task
   (label CTask2a)
   (subtasks Method2aA Method2aB Method2aC)
   (qaf q_max)
)


(spec_task
   (label CTask2b)
   (subtasks Method2bA Method2bB Method2bC Method2bD Method2bE)
   (qaf q_max)
)

(spec_method
   (label)
   (agent Agent_Red)
   (outcomes
      (Method2aA_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 20.0 0.5 25.0 0.25 15.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 20 0.5 27 0.25 13 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

(spec_method
   (label Method2aAC)
   (agent)
   (outcomes
      (Method2aA_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 20.0 0.5 25.0 0.25 15.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 20 0.5 27 0.25 13 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

(spec_task
   (label Window3)
   (earliest_start_time 36)
   (deadline 62)
   (subtasks CTask3aS Syncl CTask3bS CTask3c)
   (qaf q_sum)
)

(spec_task
   (label CTask3aS)
   (subtasks Setup3aA Setup3aB Setup3aC)
   (qaf q_max)
)

(spec_method
   (label Setup3aA)
   (agent Agent_Red)
   (outcomes
      (Setup3aA_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 10.0 0.5 13.0 0.25 7.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 10 0.5 12 0.25 8 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

   (label Setup3aB)
   (agent Agent_Red)
   (outcomes
      (Setup3aB_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 8.0 1.0)
         (duration_distribution 8 0.5 10 0.25 6 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

   (label Setup3aC)
   (agent Agent_Red)
   (outcomes
      (Setup3aC_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 6.0 0.5 9.0 0.25 3.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 6 1.0)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

(spec_task
   (label Syncl)
   (subtasks CTask3aE CTask3bF)
   (qaf q_sync_sum)
)

(spec_task
   (label CTask3aE)
   (subtasks Engage3aA Engage3aB Engage3aC)
   (qaf q_max)
)


(spec_method
   (label Engage3aA)
   (agent Agent_Red)
   (outcomes
      (Engage3aA_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 10.0 0.5 13.0 0.25 7.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 10 0.5 13 0.25 7 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

   (label Engage3aB)
   (agent Agent_Red)
   (outcomes
      (Engage3aB_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 8.0 0.5 10.0 0.25 6.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 8 0.5 10 0.25 6 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )

   (label Engage3aC)
   (agent Agent_Red)

         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 6.0 0.5 7.0 0.25 5.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 6 1.0)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

(spec_task
   (label CTask3bF)
   (subtasks Engage3bA Engage3bB Engage3bC Engage3bD Engage3bE Engage3bF)
   (qaf q_max)
)


(spec_method
   (label Engage3bA)
   (agent Agent_Purple)
   (outcomes
      (Engage3bA_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 10.0 0.5 13.0 0.25 7.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 10 0.5 13 0.25 7 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)


(spec_method
   (label Engage3bB)
   (agent Agent_Purple)
   (outcomes
      (Engage3bB_o0
         (density 0.8)
         (quality_distribution 8.0 0.5 11.0 0.25 5.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 8 0.5 10 0.25 6 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
      (Engage3bB_o1
         (density 0.2)
         (quality_distribution 0.0 1.0)
         (duration_distribution 8 0.5 10 0.25 6 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )	
   )
)

   (label Engage3bC)
   (agent Agent_Purple)
   (outcomes
      (Engage3bC_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 6.0 0.5 8.0 0.25 4.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 6 1.0)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

   (label Engage3bD)
   (agent Agent_Yellow)

         (duration_distribution 8 0.5 5 0.25 11 0.25)

      )

         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )

(spec_task
   (label CTask3bS)
   (subtasks Setup3bA Setup3bB Setup3bC Setup3bD Setup3bE Setup3bF)
   (qaf q_max)
)

(spec_task
   (label CTask3c)
   (earliest_start_time 0)
   (deadline 26)
   (subtasks Method3cA Method3cB Method3cC Method3cD)
   (qaf q_max)
)

(spec_method
   (label Method3cA)
   (agent Agent_Yellow)
   (outcomes
      (Method3cA_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 20.0 0.5 27.0 0.25 13.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 20 0.5 25 0.25 15 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

(spec_method
   (label Method3cB)
   (agent Agent_Yellow)
   (outcomes
      (Method3cB_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 16.0 0.5 18.0 0.25 14.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 16 0.5 19 0.25 13 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)


(spec_method
   (label Method3cC)
   (agent Agent_Yellow)
   (outcomes
      (Method3cC_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 12.0 0.5 14.0 0.25 10.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 12 0.5 13 0.25 11 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

   (label Method3cD)
   (agent Agent_Green)
   (outcomes
      (Method3cD_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 16.0 0.5 18.0 0.25 14.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 16 0.5 19 0.25 13 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )

(spec_task
   (label Window4)
   (earliest_start_time 54)
   (deadline 80)
   (subtasks CTask4a CTask4b)
   (qaf q_sum)
)

(spec_task
   (label CTask4a)
   (subtasks Method4aA Method4aB Method4aC)
   (qaf q_max)
)


(spec_task
   (label CTask4b)
   (subtasks Method4bA Method4bB Method4bC Method4bD)
   (qaf q_max)
)


(spec_method
   (label Method4aA)
   (agent Agent_Green)
   (outcomes
      (Method4aA_o0
         (density 1.0)
         (quality_distribution 20.0 0.5 27.0 0.25 13.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 20 0.5 25 0.25 15 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

   (label Method4aB)
   (agent Agent_Green)

         (density 1.0)

         (duration_distribution 16 0.5 18 0.25 14 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )

   (label Method4aC)
   (agent Agent_Green)

         (density 0.8)
         (quality_distribution 12.0 0.5 14.0 0.25 10.0 0.25)
         (duration_distribution 12 0.5 13 0.25 11 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )

         (density 0.2)
         (quality_distribution 0.0 1.0)
         (duration_distribution 12 0.5 13 0.25 11 0.25)
         ;;(cost_distribution 10.0 1.0)
      )
   )
)

(spec_enables
   (label)
   (from CTask3c)
   (to CTask4b)

)

(spec_enables
   (label enables10)
   (from CTask3c)
   (to CTask4b_wrong)

)

(spec_enables
   (label enables4)
   (from CTask3aS_wrong)
   (to Syncl_wrong)

)

(spec_disables
   (label disables1)
   (from CTask3bS_wrong)
   (to Syncl_wrong)

)

(spec_disables
   (label disables10)
   (from CTask3bS)
   (to Syncl_wrong)

)

(spec_disables
   (label)
   (from CTask3bS)
   (to Syncl)

)

(spec_facilitates
   (label)
   (from Engage3bE)
   (to Method4bB)
   (quality_power 0.5 1.0)
   (duration_power 0.8 1.0)
)

(spec_facilitates
   (label facilitates23)
   (from Engage3bF)
   (to Method4bD_wrong)
   (quality_power 0.5 1.0)
   (duration_power 0.8 1.0)
)

(spec_facilitates
   (label facilitates22)
   (from Engage3bF_wrong)
   (to Method4bD_wrong)
   (quality_power 0.5 1.0)
   (duration_power 0.8 1.0)
)

(spec_hinders
   (label)
   (from Method3cB_wrong)
   (to Method4aC_wrong)
   (quality_power 0.5 1.0)
   (duration_power 0.8 1.0)
)

(spec_hinders
   (label hinders1)
   (from Method3cB)
   (to Method4aC_wrong)
   (quality_power 0.5 1.0)
   (duration_power 0.8 1.0)
)

(spec_hinders
   (label hinders2)
   (from Method3cB_wrong)
   (to Method4aC_wrong)
   (quality_power 0.5 1.0)
   (duration_power 0.8 1.0)
)

(spec_newtaems
	(time 20)
	(splice
		(Window1)
		(subtasks CTaskWrong)
	)
	(splice
		(Window1_wrong)
		(subtasks CTaskNew)
	)
   	(spec_task
   		(label CTaskNew)
   		(subtasks MethodNew1 MethodNew2)
   		(qaf q_max)
	)
	(spec_method
   		(label MethodNew1)
   		(agent Agent1)
   		(outcomes
      		(MethodNew1_o0
         		(density 1.0)
         		(quality_distribution 12.0 1.0)
         		(duration_distribution 12 0.5 14 0.25 10 0.25))))
   	(spec_method
   		(label MethodNew2)
   		(agent Agent1)
   		(outcomes
      		(MethodNew2_o0
         		(density 1.0)
         		(quality_distribution 12.0 1.0)
         		(duration_distribution 12 0.5 14 0.25 10 0.25))))
)
